casebody.data:
Billy Joe NORRIS, Appellant, v. SHERIFF OF COLLIN COUNTY, TEXAS, Appellee. No. 15662. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Dec. 2, 1955. Billy Joe Norris, Leavenworth, Kan., for appellant. Dwight Whitwell, McKinney, Tex., for appellee.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge, and HOLMES and RIVES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

An examination of the pleadings and the record showing that there was no basis in law for plaintiff’s suit, the judgment denying him relief is affirmed.
